description:
'''DJ Olive''' (also known as '''The Audio Janitor'''; born '''Gregor Asch''') is an American [[disc jockey]] and [[turntablist]]. He is known for producing music generally in the [[electronic music|electronic]] genre, with strong influences of [[Dub music|dub]], and [[free improvisation]] styles. He is widely credited with coining of the term "[[Illbient]]" in 1994. He was a founding member of the immersionist group [[Lalalandia Entertainment Research Corporation]] in 1991.

DJ Olive is a member of [[We (illbient group)|We]], Lunchbox and Liminal. He has also collaborated with [[Kim Gordon]], [[Ikue Mori]], [[William Hooker (musician)|William Hooker]], [[Zeena Parkins]], [[Uri Caine]], [[Medeski Martin and Wood]], [[Dave Douglas (trumpeter)|Dave Douglas]], and various others.
